name: Gigabyte GM-M6800 Wired Optical Mouse
Features: [20G Maximum acceleration, Best C/P value for Gaming user, Dual Lens: Features dual lens solution for advanced precision, 1600 DPI High-definition optical technology: deliver 2-4 times sensitivity of standard optical mice. Experience smooth, precise tracking., DPI adjustable (800/1600 DPI): 2-level sensitivity switching, Total-comfort design: Equipped with soft rubber grips and contoured shape to provide superior grasp during the longest gaming sessions., Super-smooth feet: Slide easily across almost any surface.]
